examples: As a defensive measure he built a series of coastal forts and watchtowers.
Como medida defensiva construyó una serie de fortalezas costeras y torres de vigilancia.
Se trata de medidas puramente defensivas.
Troops took up a defensive position around the town.
Las tropas tomaron posiciones defensivas alrededor de la ciudad.
Don't ask him about his plans—he just gets defensive.
No le pregunte sobre sus planes, simplemente se pone a la defensiva.
